org.jcvi.jillion.fasta

Interface FastaRecord<S,T extends Sequence<S>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of sequence the record uses.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Defline
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NucleotideFastaRecord, ProteinFastaRecord, QualityFastaRecord
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentedProteinFastaRecord, PositionFastaRecord, UnCommentedProteinFastaRecord

    public interface FastaRecord<S,T extends Sequence<S>>
extends Defline
    FastaRecord is an interface for interacting with a single FASTA record.
    Author:
    jsitz, dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object o)
      Two FastaRecords are equal if they both have the same id and the same sequence.
      default long getLength()
      Get the sequence length.
      T getSequence()
      Get the Sequence associated with this record.
      int hashCode() 

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jcvi.jillion.core.Defline

        getComment, getId, of, of

    • Method Detail

      • getSequence

        T getSequence()
        Get the Sequence associated with this record.
        Returns:
        a Sequence, never null.

      • getLength

        default long getLength()
        Get the sequence length.
        Implementation Requirements:
        the default implementation of this method calls getSequence().getLength() but some FastaRecord implementations may optimize this return value.
        Returns:
        the length of this record sequence, usually the number of residues or qualities.
        Since:
        5.0

      • equals

        boolean equals(Object o)
        Two FastaRecords are equal if they both have the same id and the same sequence.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object

        int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
